original_title: UFC Fight Night 102: Lewis vs. Abdurakhimov
overview: UFC Fight Night 102: Lewis vs. Abdurakhimov was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on December 9, 2016, at Times Union Center in Albany, New York. A heavyweight bout between Derrick Lewis and Shamil Abdurakhimov served as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 102: Lewis vs. Abdurakhimov
